message.subject: Why markers don't make good Christmas gifts...
message.content:
M1.1. Teb -
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. Even though PPL has a discounted rate for Red Rock, will we have to file it as a negotiated rate because the fuel is locked in at 5% for the term of the contract?
[Request-Information: will PPL's discounted rate for Red Rock have to be filed as a negotiated rate because of fuel percentage that is locked in as per contract term]
Flink1.2

message.subject: Why markers don't make good Christmas gifts...
message.content:
M2.1. Yes.
[Inform: yes, it will have to be filed as a negotiated rate]
Blink1.2
